articles.title: Nigeria's UAC to buy minority stake as S.Africa's Tiger Brands exits - Reuters
articles.description: Nigerian conglomerate UAC Plc has signed an agreement to acquire the minority shares of its unlisted subsidiary UAC Foods from South Africa's Tiger Brands next month, it said.

articles.author: Emele Onu
articles.title: Tiger Brands becomes latest SA company to exit Nigeria - News24
articles.description: South Africa's Tiger Brands has agreed to sell its 49% minority shareholding in UAC Foods to parent UAC of Nigeria.
